channel.title: digital art on Den of devils
channel.description: Recent content in digital art on Den of devils

item.title: Love hotel
item.description: Love hotel Something quick-ish (~1 hour) inspired by a cool phonecase customization I saw on Pinterest. Made with Procreate. Bonus: the phone on its own

item.title: Bigger smile
item.description: Bigger smile Originally the original piece was going to feature Alastor upside down, but I decided against it. Made with Procreate. Alternate versions

item.title: Malware
item.description: Malware Angel Dust was inspired by PostPet, while Alastor was inspired by the infamous BonziBuddy. Made with Procreate.

item.title: The World / The star
item.description: The World Meet Drazkise, a character for a D&D campaign based on magical girls and Super Sentai. His «superhero» outfit is inspired by the World tarot card. Made with Procreate. The Star This one is Memoru, my backup for the same campaign that doubles as Drazkise’s roommate. His magical boy outfit is inspired by the Star tarot card. Much like the previous piece, this was made with Procreate.

item.title: April 1st
item.description: April 1st Something quick based on this official Hazbin Hotel art. Made with Krita, using Pixel Glade’s dithering brushes.
